channel.title: References on API Mocking and Testing | Microcks.io
channel.description: Recent content in References on API Mocking and Testing | Microcks.io

item.title: Container Images
item.description: Introduction Microcks components are distributed as OCI container images that can be executed using container runtimes such as Docker or Podman.

item.title: Mock Templates
item.description: Introduction This page contains the comprehensive lists of variables and functions that can be used to genete dynamic mock content in Microcks.

item.title: Test Parameters
item.description: Introduction From the page displaying basic information on your API or Service mocks, you have the ability to launch new tests against different endpoints that may be representing different environment into your development process.

item.title: API Metadata Format
item.description: Introduction Some Microcks mocks specific metadata or properties cannot be fully deduced from common attributes coming from OpenAPI or AsyncAPI.

item.title: API Examples Format
item.description: Introduction APIExamples format is Microcks’ own specification format for defining examples intended to be used by Microcks mocks.

item.title: Testcontainers Modules
item.description: Introduction As introduced in our Developing with Testcontainers guide, you can be embed Microcks into your unit tests with the help of Testcontainers librairies.
